INSERT_STUDENT: INSERT INTO sm_student(id, name, gender, dob, address, email) VALUES
INSERT_CLASS: INSERT INTO sm_class(id_class, name_class, grade, session) VALUES(
LIST_STUDENT_IN_CLASS: SELECT sm_student.name AS Name, sm_student.gender AS dobder, sm_student.dob AS Year, sm_student.address AS Address, sm_class.name AS Class FROM sm_class_list,sm_class,sm_student WHERE sm_class_list.class=sm_class.id AND sm_class_list.student=sm_student.id AND sm_class.name=? AND sm_class._year=?;
NUMBER_OF_STUDENTS_IN_CLASS: SELECT COUNT(sm_student.id) AS Total FROM sm_class_list,sm_class,sm_student WHERE sm_class_list.class=sm_class.id AND sm_class_list.student=sm_student.id AND sm_class.name=?;
INSERT_TEACHER: INSERT INTO sm_teacher(id, password, username, name, gender, dob, address, email, phone) VALUES
TEACHER_DETAIL: SELECT username, name, gender, dob, address, email, phone FROM sm_teacher WHERE sm_teacher.id=
LOGIN_VERIFICATION: SELECT id, password FROM sm_teacher WHERE sm_teacher.username=
SUBJECT_TRANSCRIPT: SELECT sm_class.name AS Class, sm_subject.name AS Subject, sm_semester.name AS Semester, sm_student.name AS Name, sm_transcript.exam_1 , sm_transcript.exam_2 , sm_transcript.exam_1*0.2 + sm_transcript.exam_2*0.8 AS Average FROM sm_student, sm_transcript, sm_semester, sm_subject, sm_class, sm_class_list WHERE sm_student.id=sm_transcript.student_code AND sm_semester.id=sm_transcript.semester AND sm_subject.id=sm_transcript._subject AND sm_student.id=sm_class_list.student AND sm_class.id=sm_class_list.class AND sm_class.name=? AND sm_semester.name=? AND sm_subject.name=?;
AVG_SCORE: SELECT sm_student.id, SUM(sm_transcript.exam_1*0.2 +sm_transcript.exam_2*0.8)/9 AS TBHK FROM  sm_student, sm_transcript, sm_semester, sm_subject, sm_class, sm_class_list WHERE sm_student.id=sm_transcript.student_code AND sm_semester.id=sm_transcript.semester AND sm_subject.id=sm_transcript._subject AND sm_student.id=sm_class_list.student AND sm_class.id=sm_class_list.class AND sm_semester.name=? GROUP BY sm_student.id;
